item.title: Judge Judy 10 Fakest Things About The Show, According To Cast, Crew, & Litigants
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJudge Judy is actually an arbitrator, not a judge, on the show. She helps resolve disputes between parties who don’t want to go through a lengthy court case. The courtroom on the show is not a real courtroom, but a well-designed set. It adds to the authenticity of the show, but it’s not an actual courthouse. The audience in the Judge Judy courtroom is made up mostly of paid extras, not people related to the cases.

The adaptation of the arc stayed true to the manga while also adding creative enhancements, and the sound design and voice acting were exceptional. The villains were also standout characters.

item.description: SUMMARYLoki season 2 revealed that Thor was deified on Earth before his own film, which could have allowed the possibility of a darker, morally gray storyline about his pre-MCU days in Thor: Love and Thunder. However, Thor: Love and Thunder opted for a more light-hearted tone and focused on Thor’s growth in the MCU, making the exploration of his past before the MCU unnecessary.

Jack’s evolution from a man of science to someone who understood destiny and fate played a pivotal role in driving the narrative and making other parts of the show run smoothly.

item.title: Lost s Time Travel Rules & Effects Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThere are two types of time travel in Lost, one involving temporal displacement and the other physically occurring due to The Island. “Whatever happened, happened” is a key rule of time travel in Lost. Justin is living a private life after the show and seems to be happier with his new partner, despite the mean comments from trolls.

item.title: Married At First Sight s Orion Put On Blast Over Hypocritical Comments About Racial Slur
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarried At First Sight’s Orion Martzloff faces backlash for his hypocritical comments about a joke made by Lauren, highlighting their controversial conversation about derogatory language. Orion admitted to using the N-word but couldn’t handle it after asking if Lauren had used “r** s***,” causing fans to question his reasoning and accuse him of trapping her. Orion’s immaturity and lack of consideration for Lauren’s feelings, coupled with the looming cheating scandal, suggest that their relationship may not survive on Married At First Sight.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 17 8 Ways Orion Gave Up And Robbed Lauren Of The Experience
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOrion Martzloff disappoints Lauren’s dad and shows a lack of consideration for her in their marriage on Married at First Sight. Orion fails to understand Lauren’s intentions and cannot see things from her perspective. Orion quickly gives up on their marriage and refuses to work through the issues, showing immaturity and a lack of commitment. Literature ReviewOrion Martzloff is too immature to be in a committed relationship. His childish antics ruined the Married At First Sight experience for Lauren.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 17 Cameron Frazer s Sudden Heart Condition Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarried at First Sight season 17 cast member Cameron Frazer developed a heart condition amid his split from Clare Kerr. Cameron and Clare’s differing views on therapy and raising children in the church broke their marriage. Cameron will need to have heart surgery, which may have been exacerbated by the stress of his separation from Clare. Literature ReviewMarried at First Sight season 17 cast member Cameron Frazer developed a sudden heart condition after ending his marriage to Clare Kerr.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 17 Clare Is Pushing Therapy On Cameron (She Is Overbearing)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYClare pushes therapy on her husband Cameron, coming off as overbearing, leading to tension and miscommunication between them. Clare and Cameron have different perspectives on opportunities and drive, causing a disconnect between them and making it difficult to find common ground. Clare sends mixed signals by wanting a goofy partner but then making fun of Cameron’s goofiness, which makes him uncomfortable and unable to connect with her. Literature ReviewMarried at First Sight season 17’s Clare Kerr is showing that she has an overbearing personality by pushing therapy on her new husband Cameron Frazer.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 17 Fans Call Out Clare For Being Disingenuous With Therapist Rhetoric
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarried at First Sight fans are criticizing cast member Clare for being disingenuous and using therapist rhetoric to push her own narratives on her husband. Clare is failing to find a romantic spark with her husband Cameron and fans believe it’s because she is controlling and unwilling to see things from his perspective. Cameron and Clare are experiencing a disconnect due to their different core values and inability to compromise, and Clare’s unappreciativeness of Cameron’s efforts is causing further problems in their marriage.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 17 Only Has 3 Couples Left & The Experts Are To Blame
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe experts are to blame for the low success rate of Married at First Sight season 17, as evident by the runaway bride incident with Michael. The experts let down Orion and Lauren by not intervening earlier when their relationship was experiencing difficulties during the honeymoon. The experts should be more involved and step in when the couples face impasses or issues, like they have with Emily and Brennan, to increase the success rate.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 17 The Real Red Flags In Lauren And Orion s Marriage
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLauren and Orion’s cultural differences and the importance they place on their respective heritages have empowered them in getting to know each other. Orion’s lack of consideration for Lauren’s opinions and desires raises concerns about his readiness for a mutually supportive partnership. Orion’s short fuse and potential to be easily offended, especially regarding his Indigenous heritage, may lead to tense disagreements with Lauren and create misunderstandings. Literature ReviewMarried At First Sight Season 17 couple Lauren and Orion have presented several red flags to viewers, signaling they may not be compatible.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 17 Why Becca Should Leave Austin (Spoilers)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBecca and Austin’s relationship troubles stem from their different views on religion and intimacy. Their refusal to discuss serious subjects prevented them from forming a deep connection. Despite the “I love you” exchange, Becca can do better than Austin due to his religious beliefs and their sexual compatibility issues. Literature ReviewBecca and Austin were Married At First Sight season 17’s best couple. However, what Austin said to Becca was wrong and is a relationship red flag.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 7 Danielle & Bobby s 2023 Instagram Highlights
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDanielle and Bobby celebrated their fifth wedding anniversary and have a strong and successful marriage despite the challenges of being on Married At First Sight. They recently welcomed their third child, Savannah, and their Instagram is filled with adorable family photos. Danielle posted a heartfelt tribute to Bobby on Father’s Day, expressing her gratitude for his commitment to fatherhood and their family. Literature ReviewDanielle and Bobby Dodd are the only Married At First Sight season 7 couple still together.

item.title: Married At First Sight Season 9s Beth Bice Accuses Jamie Of Stealing This Major Item From Her
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBeth Bice reflects on her divorce from Jamie Thompson and reveals that she should have listened to her exes’ warnings. Beth can’t provide details on her divorce until it is finalized to avoid any legal action from her ex. The relationship between Beth and Jamie was tumultuous from the start, but they fought to make it work despite the low success rate of Married At First Sight. Literature ReviewMarried At First Sight season 9 star Beth Bice accused her estranged husband Jamie Thompson of stealing one major item from her in recent posts.

item.title: Married At First Sight Viewers Call Out Lack Of Intimacy Among Couples In Season 17
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLack of compatibility and attraction among the couples in Married at First Sight season 17 has been a major issue, with no couples getting intimate yet. The panel of experts’ matching skills have come into question, as viewers feel they have dropped the ball in creating compatible pairs. Emotional and compatibility dynamics have caused most of the issues, but there is hope for some couples to work on their attraction and have healthy marriages.

item.title: Married At First Sight What Christina Crochet is Up To In 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChristina from Married at First Sight Season 11 moved to Mexico and looks happier and more beautiful than ever. She has mixed feelings about the show, laughing about her time but also acknowledging its drama and corruption. Christina has gone off the radar and prefers a private life away from fame and celebrity. Literature ReviewChristina Crochet didn’t have the best Married At First Sight experience, but she has moved on.

item.title: Married At First Sight What Iris Caldwell & Keith Manley Are Up To In 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIris and Keith’s lack of intimacy and Iris’s immaturity about it were major issues in their relationship on Married at First Sight season 9. Both Iris and Keith have moved on from their MAFS journey and are focusing on their careers. Despite their divorce, Iris and Keith have no regrets about their marriage and wish each other the best. They are both single and may find happiness outside of the show.

item.title: Married At First Sight What Mia Bally From Season 7 Is Up To In 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewMarried at First Sight was just the beginning for Mia Bally. There’s plenty to learn about what the reality TV star has been up to since MAFS. On Married at First Sight, Mia and her match Tristan got off to a promising start. As two entrepreneurial people of faith who were apparently attracted to one another, they seemed like a perfect pairing. Unfortunately, the couple quickly hit a bumpy road, as Mia was arrested for credit card fraud and stalking just before the reality TV couple set off on their honeymoon.

item.title: Married At First Sight What We Know About Jamie & Doug s RV Home
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewMarried at First Sight alums Jamie Otis and Doug Hehner lived in an RV for around a year before settling down in a permanent home. When Jamie and Doug met during MAFS season 1 back in 2014, viewers could tell that they were smitten from the start. Although Jamie showed some doubts at first—particularly regarding her attraction to Doug—the couple enjoyed a smooth transition period, and stayed married after Decision Day.

item.title: Married At First Sight What We Know About The Woman Michael Married (SPOILERS)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarried At First Sight season 17 includes the first-ever runaway bride in the history of the series. Michael’s second bride is identified as Chloe Brown, a senior director at the American Heart Association. Michael and Chloe got married about six weeks after the other couples and their journey will be shown in upcoming episodes. Literature ReviewMichael was jilted at the altar by a runaway bride in Married At First Sight season 17, but the experts found him a new stranger to marry.

item.title: Married At First Sight Why All Season 17 Couples Will Break Up
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarried At First Sight has a notoriously low success rate in creating long-lasting marriages. One groom, Michael, was left at the altar but given a second chance with another bride. Lauren and Orion have already divorced due to a racial misunderstanding, while Clare and Cameron face religious differences. Literature ReviewMarried At First Sight season 17 started with the experts pairing up five sets of strangers. All the couples look like they are headed for divorce.

item.title: Married At First Sights Orion Should “Seek Therapy” Before Next Relationship, According To Fans
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOrion’s disappointing behavior and decision to leave Lauren on Married At First Sight has garnered criticism from fans, who believe he allowed unresolved childhood trauma to ruin their marriage. Viewers feel that the experts failed Lauren by pairing her with Orion, who was not ready for a serious relationship and lacked maturity. The failed marriages on Married At First Sight are more intriguing than the remaining ones, and fans hope for more thoughtful pairings and better communication in the future.

item.title: Marry My Husband Episodes 5 & 6 Recap 7 Biggest Story Reveals
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe main characters in Marry My Husband, Ji-won and Ji-hyuk, have discovered each other’s secrets. Ji-hyuk has confessed his feelings for Ji-won and expressed his desire to be with her. Ji-hyuk may have died and come back multiple times, and the show hints at him being obsessed with fixing things in his pursuit of Ji-won. Literature ReviewFrom the 2005 flashbacks to the BTS song twist, Marry My Husband’s episodes 5 and 6 included some game-changing moments for the Prime Video K-drama.

item.title: Marvel Accidentally Confirms If Daredevil Was Snapped By Thanos Or Not
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Echo confirms that Maya Lopez’s fight with Daredevil takes place at some point between 2018 and 2025, meaning that Matt Murdock wasn’t a victim of Thanos’ Snap. Daredevil’s brief appearance in Echo debunks the fan theory that Kingpin was able to rise back to power during the Blip thanks to Daredevil’s absence. Daredevil and Kingpin’s presence during the Blip provides the MCU with plenty of creative possibilities for their character development in future appearances.

item.title: Marvel Can Redeem A Daredevil Character If Netflix s Shows Are MCU Canon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIf the Netflix Daredevil series is considered canon in the MCU, Marvel has the chance to redeem characters like Elektra and continue their stories. Elektra’s character arc in the Netflix Marvel universe was underwhelming, and she deserves a shot at redemption in the MCU. The MCU has the opportunity to bring Elektra back in Daredevil: Born Again, similar to how Daredevil himself was brought back in the Netflix series.

item.title: Marvel Crowns A New Most Powerful MCU Hero After The Most OP Upgrade Ever
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain Carter becomes the most powerful MCU character, thanks to an OP upgrade that includes the Infinity Armor, Hela’s helmet, and a gamma-infused sword. The escalation of power in the MCU is a storytelling issue that requires each new villain to be more powerful than the last. While characters like G’iah and God Loki add excitement, their immense power poses challenges for future storylines and may require even bigger threats to justify their presence.

item.title: Marvel Delivers Joss Whedon s Lost Avenger 11 Years After Phase 1 s End
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWhat If…? Season 2 episode 5 delivered an Avenger that was lost from Joss Whedon’s original script 11 years after the end of MCU Phase 1. Warning! This article contains spoilers for What If…? season 2, episode 5, ““What If… Captain Carter Fought the Hydra Stomper?” Create an account to keep reading Lighter Ad Experience Free Unlimited Access Manage Newsletter Preferences Access To New Features continue Already have an account?

item.title: Marvel Finally Avoided The Avengers Issue That Plagues Every New MCU Hero
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho’s self-contained story and exploration of the Choctaw nation sets it apart from other MCU projects. By avoiding the question of whether Maya Lopez will join the Avengers, Echo’s ending provides a well-rounded and earned conclusion for the character. Echo’s future in the MCU is not necessary, which breaks the usual pattern of introducing characters for future franchise involvement. Literature ReviewAn Avengers issue that affects the majority of new MCU heroes has finally been avoided by a recent entry into the long-running franchise.

item.title: Marvel Fixed Kingpin After A Bizarre MCU Debut
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKingpin’s portrayal in Hawkeye received criticism for his increased strength, wardrobe changes, and altered tone. Echo fixed Kingpin by showcasing his brutal tendencies and more emotional qualities, similar to his depiction in Marvel Television’s Daredevil. Kingpin could become a major threat to the street-level heroes of the MCU, as there have been hints at him becoming the Thanos of the street-level corner of the MCU. Literature ReviewMarvel Studios received criticism for Kingpin’s depiction in Phase 4’s Hawkeye, but these concerns have now been addressed with Wilson Fisk’s return.

item.title: Marvel Has Subtly Set Up The MCU s Second Civil War
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDisney+’s Echo hints at a potential second Civil War in the MCU with Kingpin as New York City’s Mayor. Kingpin’s mayoral run sets up a conflict between heroes and villains, similar to the comics’ Devil’s Reign storyline. Fisk could use a team like the Thunderbolts to hunt down and potentially kill New York’s heroes, posing a greater threat than Captain America: Civil War. Literature ReviewCaptain America: Civil War could be getting an MCU sequel of sorts, as Marvel’s latest release has laid the path for a violent, major event.

item.title: Marvel Is Setting Up A New MCU Saga Better Than The Multiverse
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho re-introduces Kingpin as a compelling villain and sets up a street-level MCU saga that is more exciting than the Multiverse storyline. The street-level heroes of the MCU, like Echo and Daredevil, have been successful in building a clear and solid narrative, unlike the multiverse story. The post-credits scene in Echo hints at Kingpin becoming the mayor of NYC, which could spice up the hero/villain relationship and potentially lead to his appearance in Spider-Man 4.

item.title: Marvel Just Made Captain America s Endgame Ending An Even Bigger Plot Hole
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s “What If…?” Season 2 potentially makes Steve Rogers’ ending in “Avengers: Endgame” an even bigger plot hole. The show features an incursion of intermingling timelines thanks to a Captain America variant who’s sent to the past in 1602, raising questions about the consequences of Rogers’ actions in the main MCU by staying in the past with Peggy. The animated series highlights the discrepancy between the consequences faced in 1602 and the lack thereof for the primary Steve Rogers in Earth-616.

item.title: Marvel Just Made Captain America s MCU Absence Even Worse
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSam Wilson’s absence as Captain America in What If…? season 2 is a jarring choice, especially given the presence of other Avengers variants. The MCU has chosen to prioritize Captain Carter’s character over Sam Wilson, leaving a four-year gap of no Captain America in the franchise. Sam Wilson’s Captain America and Shang-Chi are the two Avengers missing from Marvel’s What If…?, and their future roles in the MCU may be affected by their absence.

item.title: Marvel Just Made Daredevil Born Again s Most Controversial Change Even Worse
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel Studios may have made the controversial changes to “Daredevil: Born Again” even worse with the release of the “Echo” trailer, which confirms connections to the Netflix show. The rumored absence of Karen Page and Foggy Nelson in the MCU’s “Daredevil” show makes little sense, especially if the Netflix show is now being considered canon. It’s still possible for Karen and Foggy to appear in “Daredevil: Born Again” since the show has undergone an overhaul, and the trailer for “Echo” suggests that Netflix’s stories are now canon to the MCU.

item.title: Marvel Just Proved One Hero s Betrayal Secretly Cost Millions Of Lives In The MCU
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWhat If…? season 2 shows that if Peter Quill had remained on Earth, the Guardians of the Galaxy would have never formed, potentially preventing Thanos’ snap. Yondu’s decision to keep and raise Peter Quill in Guardians of the Galaxy indirectly caused Thanos’ snap in the live-action MCU. Peter Quill wiping out eight of the Nine Realms before coming to Earth in What If…? suggests there may have been no right choice for Yondu.

item.title: Marvel s Echo 12 Easter Eggs & MCU References Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMaya sabotages Fisk Shipping, reminiscent of Fisk’s Union Allied in Daredevil. Madripoor is referenced as a seedy city in the MCU known for corrupt criminals and black-market operations. Kingpin survives his gunshot wound given to him by Maya which is inspired by the original comics, and a flashback to 2008 confirms Kingpin had power long before 2013’s Daredevil series. Literature ReviewMarvel’s Echo features a collection of fun Easter eggs calling back to the MCU’s past, the comics, and even Netflix’s Daredevil series.

item.title: Marvel s Echo Choctaw Creation Myth & Real World Differences Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel Studios collaborated with the Choctaw Nation and the IllumiNative organization to ensure an authentic depiction of Choctaw culture in Echo. The opening moments of Echo episode 1, “Chafa,” explored the Choctaw Nation’s creation myth and stayed true to real-world mythology while adding some of the MCU’s typical supernatural elements. Maya Lopez’s powers as Echo in the MCU connect her directly to her Native American ancestry, giving new meaning to her superhero moniker.

item.title: Marvel s Echo Ending Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMaya Lopez, also known as Echo, chooses to embrace her family and ancestors’ legacy in the finale of Marvel’s Echo, leading to a major showdown with Wilson Fisk, the Kingpin. Maya taps into the power of her ancestors and attempts to heal Kingpin, confusing and leaving him shaken. In Echo’s post-credits scene, it is implied that Kingpin will attempt to run for New York’s mayor in the MCU’s future, setting up a potential storyline in Daredevil: Born Again.

item.title: Marvel s Echo First Social Media Reactions Are Here
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEarly reactions say Echo is one of Marvel’s best Disney+ offerings with breathless fight scenes and a stunningly unique voice. Echo does some unexpected things and fits into the old Daredevil universe, while it is exciting to see Wilson Fisk and Daredevil back. Echo’s first episode delivers a tragic backstory and exceeds expectations with great acting, atmospheric storytelling, and interesting sound design. Literature ReviewAs Marvel Studios’ Echo TV show is set to arrive this week on Disney+ and Hulu, the first batch of social media reactions are officially here.

item.title: Marvel s Echo Post-Credits Scene Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe post-credits scene in Marvel’s Echo sets up Kingpin’s bid for mayor of New York City. Kingpin watches a TV program discussing the need for a fighter as the next mayor, inspiring him to run. The scene confirms Kingpin’s storyline in Daredevil: Born Again, which adapts a storyline from the Marvel Comics. Literature ReviewMarvel’s Echo show includes one end credits scene after the fifth episode, “Maya.” We break down what it means for Maya Lopez and Kingpin.

item.title: Marvel s Echo Rotten Tomatoes Score Improvement Still Holds Disappointing MCU Record
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Echo debuted to a 67% critics score and a 77% audience score on Rotten Tomatoes upon release, making it the second worst received MCU show after Secret Invasion. Despite a 6-percent increase in critics score to 73% within two days, Echo retains its spot in the MCU’s lowest rankings on Rotten Tomatoes. Within the same two-day span, Echo’s audience score dropped to 70%, further contributing to its unfortunate MCU record.

item.title: Marvel s Highest RT-Scored 2023 MCU Project Returns In Moon Girl & Devil Dinosaur Season 2 Trailer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMoon Girl and Devil Dinosaur season 2 will premiere on Disney XD and Disney+ in 2024, following the critical success of the first season. The returning cast includes Diamond White and Fred Tatasciore reprising their roles as the main characters, along with Alfre Woodard and Laurence Fishburne. The new season will explore the consequences of Moon Girl’s superhero identity clashing with her personal life, and may further connect to the wider MCU, possibly including references to Wakanda.

item.title: Marvel s New Thor Story Hints Odin Would ve Become An MCU Phase 4 Villain If He Hadn t Died
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOdin could have been a major villain in the MCU’s Phase 4 if he had survived Thor: Ragnarok. The fact that What If…?’s Odin knew about the existence of the Ten Rings suggests that the live-action Odin also knew about the Ten Rings used by Xu Wenwu and Shang-Chi. Odin’s potential conflict with Shang-Chi over the ownership of the Ten Rings could have taken the new MCU hero out of the picture.

item.title: Marvel Subtly Reveals Another Avenger Could Have Survived Iron Man s Endgame Snap
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain Carter proves another hero could have survived wielding the Infinity Stones in Avengers: Endgame. Captain America could have wielded the Stones beyond Tony Stark’s Iron Man. Despite the possibility of Steve Rogers’ survival, Iron Man was still the only one who could have wielded the Stones to ensure victory due to his unique technology and circumstances foreseen by Doctor Strange. Literature ReviewA dynamic hero in the MCU’s multiverse has provided strong evidence that another Avenger could have survived Iron Man’s snap in Endgame.

item.title: Marvels What If Creators Reveal Why They Cant Use The X-Men
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYX-Men were off-limits for the animated series, as Marvel wanted to introduce them first in live action. The creators wanted to explore various Marvel characters, but faced limitations. Marvel’s decision prioritized live action over animation for the MCU’s X-Men. Literature ReviewWhat If…? season 2 used many exciting Marvel characters; however, the X-Men were not present, and it turns out there is a key reason why. Marvel’s What If…? creators reveal why the Marvel Cinematic Universe animated series was not allowed to use the X-Men.

item.title: MASH Producer Admits The Harsh Reality Of Filming The New Reunion
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe recently released MASH reunion lacked the magic of previous reunions due to the actors doing their interviews separately, preventing interactions among the cast members. The format of the 2023 special focused more on the history of MASH rather than on fun anecdotes and stories shared by the actors. Despite its shortcomings, the 2023 MASH reunion was still a good project, considering the age of the cast members and its significance as a milestone year for the show.

item.title: MASH Reunion Special Will Feature New Interview With Trapper John Actor Wayne Rogers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe upcoming MASH reunion will feature a never-before-seen interview with Wayne Rogers, the actor who played Trapper John McIntyre. Wayne Rogers left the show due to being unhappy with his character’s role, but remained tied to the series and participated in a reunion in the early 2000s. Rogers’ inclusion in the reunion separates it from a previous impromptu reunion and offers new content from other actors who were on the show.

item.title: MASH Star Looks Back On Filming Radar s Exit & Reveals How It Initially Went Wrong
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGary Burghoff initially wanted a tearful and emotional finale for Radar’s exit in MAS*H, but the director advised against it. Burghoff insisted on his idea but later realized it was a mistake when he saw the awful result on screen during dailies. Burghoff asked for a reshoot and the director allowed him to do it again. Literature ReviewMAS*H star Gary Burghoff looks back on what it was like to film Radar’s exit, and why they had to reshoot it after it initially went wrong.

item.title: Mashle Episode #14 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMashle: Magic and Muscles episode 14 premieres on January 13, continuing the exciting story from season 1. In episode 13, Mash faces trial for being a Lackmagic but impresses with his abilities, leading to a confrontation with the Divine Visionaries. Season 2 of Mashle: Magic and Muscles has found its stride, with a stronger focus on Mash’s fight for his life and the introduction of Innocent Zero as villains.

item.title: Mashle Episode #15 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMashle: Magic and Muscles episode #14 sets up conflict for old and new characters, building excitement for episode #15. Mashle episode #15 premieres on January 20th on Crunchyroll, with specific time zones listed. Episode #14 of Mashle introduces a true fight between high-level magic users, promising a spectacle in episode #15. Literature ReviewMashle: Magic and Muscles episode #15 will showcase a true battle between high-level magic users. Mashle: Magic and Muscles episode #15 will pick up the action after the previous one provided a necessary cooldown episode for the series while still working to set up more conflict for old and new characters alike.

item.title: Masked Singers Janel Parrish Cant Believe Pretty Little Liars Fans Figured Out Her Identity So Quickly
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPretty Little Liars fans quickly recognized Janel Parrish’s identity as Gazelle on The Masked Singer. Janel had to lie to her family to keep her identity a secret, but her aunt saw through the disguise. Janel’s performances as Gazelle showcased her exceptional vocal range and dance skills, making her one of the best performers on the show. Literature ReviewThe Masked Singer season 10’s Gazelle, Janel Parrish, couldn’t believe that Pretty Little Liars fans were able to identify her so quickly.

item.title: Massive Hollow Earth Twist In Monarch s Show Retcons 3 Monsterverse Movies
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 8 retcons three Monsterverse movies by making the Hollow Earth storyline a central plot point. Bill Randa, not Dr. Houston Brooks, came up with the Hollow Earth theory first, contradicting previous information from Kong: Skull Island. Monarch had knowledge and proof of the existence of the Hollow Earth before the events of Godzilla: King of the Monsters, contrary to what was previously known. Literature ReviewThe Hollow Earth storyline set up by Monarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 8 massively retcons the Monsterverse timeline in a surprising way.

item.title: Massive Supernatural Light Novel Series Returns With New Anime Adaptation
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonogatari is having a renaissance with two new anime adaptations by SHAFT for Off Season and Monster Season, marking the series return after the last installment came out in 2019. The staff responsible for previous Monogatari works have reunited, ensuring that the anime will retain its quirky and unique style. The adaptations will cover the Off Season and Monster Season novels, which consist of short stories and a continuation of the original storyline, respectively.

item.title: Masters Of The Air Clip Shows Off Flying Skill Of Austin Butlers WW2 Pilot
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new clip from Masters of the Air features Austin Butler’s Maj. Gale “Buck” Cleven landing a B-17 bomber during high winds. The upcoming series hails from executive producers Steven Spielberg and Tom Hanks (Band of Brothers, The Pacific) and will air on Apple TV Plus. Masters of the Air tells the true story of members of the 100th Bomb Group as they fly missions against the Nazis during World War 2.

item.title: Masters Of The Air s Release Couldn t Be Better Timed After 1 Actor s Recent Success
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMasters of the Air is releasing at the perfect time to capitalize on Barry Keoghan’s recent success in the critically acclaimed film Saltburn. Keoghan’s popularity is at an all-time high following Saltburn’s streaming release, making him an ideal choice for a major role in the World War II drama. Keoghan’s acting pedigree and experience in a World War II drama like Dunkirk make him well-equipped to bring the necessary gravitas to his role in Masters of the Air.

item.title: Masters Of The Universe Revolution Trailer Finds He-Man Clashing With An Advanced Skeletor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe trailer for Masters of the Universe: Revolution has been released, featuring an epic battle between He-Man and Skeletor. The series explores unresolved storylines from the original 1980s series and debuted in 2021 with positive reviews from critics. Masters of the Universe: Revolution will focus on a battle between technology and magic, with Skeletor attacking Castle Grayskull and the return of Hordak as the main threat. Literature ReviewThe trailer for Masters of the Universe: Revolution previews the epic showdown between He-Man and Skeletor and continues Teela’s story.

item.title: Matt Klotz Would ve Voted For This Big Brother 25 Houseguest If He Was A Jury Member
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMatt Klotz admits he would have voted for Jag Bains instead of Bowie Jane if he had been a Big Brother 25 jury member. Matt believes Jag played a great game and was his “shield” throughout the season. Matt confesses that he was unprepared for the jury’s questions, but he’s proud of his game. Literature ReviewBig Brother 25 runner-up Matt Klotz avoided going to the jury house, but which houseguest would he have voted for if he didn’t make it to the Final 2?

item.title: Matthew Gray Gubler Reunites With Former Criminal Minds Villain In Sweet Image

item.description: SUMMARYMax cancels the comedy, Julia, adding to the small number of comedies on its programming slate. Literature ReviewMax confirms the fate of another two-season show after the high-profile cancellation of Our Flag Means Death, scaling down its comedy slate.

item.title: Max Show With 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score Cancelled After 2 Seasons

item.description: SUMMARYHBO Max has cancelled Rap Sh!t after 2 seasons, despite the series’ critical acclaim. The show is created by Issa Rae and follows two aspiring rappers from Miami as they attempt to make it in the music industry. Rad Sh!t’s cancellation is part of a larger trend as streamers like Max hone in on original content that drives profitability. Literature ReviewCreator Issa Rae’s Max show, which boasts a rare 100% score on Rotten Tomatoes, has been cancelled following the release of season 2 last year.

item.title: Mayim Bialik Celebrates Jeopardy s Emmy Win Despite Her Abrupt Dismissal
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFormer Jeopardy! host Mayim Bialik celebrates the show’s recent Emmy win despite her dismissal. Mayim Bialik congratulates Keke Palmer for becoming the first woman to win Outstanding Host since 2009. Bialik’s sudden dismissal from Jeopardy! was a shock to viewers. Literature ReviewMayim Bialik takes to Instagram to celebrate Jeopardy’s recent Emmy win despite her sudden dismissal from the long-running television game show. Former Jeopardy! host Mayim Bialik celebrates the popular game show’s recent Emmy win despite her sudden dismissal from the show.

item.title: MCU Actor Ke Huy Quan Reunites With Loki Season 2 Stars In Sweet Image

The image shows Quan, Tom Hiddleston, and Sophia Di Martino, who played variants of the God of Mischief. item.title: MCU Canon May Have Changed Again As Disney+ Adds 6 Shows To The Marvel Timeline
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDisney+ has added six Marvel TV shows to the Marvel Cinematic Universe timeline on the streaming service. Daredevil and other Defenders shows from Netflix are now closer to being considered part of the MCU. Disney+ now displays Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, Iron Fist, The Defenders, and The Punisher in the timeline order section of the Marvel landing page. Literature ReviewThe Marvel Cinematic Universe timeline on Disney+ is finally acknowledging the original Marvel TV era as six TV shows join the lineup on the streamer.

item.title: MCU Fan Pitches The Perfect Return For Phase 4 s Most Underrated Villain
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAn MCU fan suggests that Gorr the God Butcher should return in What If…? season 3 to go after Moon Knight and Khonshu, which would allow Gorr to finally kill gods onscreen. This scenario is a great fit for What If…? because it offers an alternate storyline and addresses previous MCU criticisms. Gorr’s potential appearances in What If…? season 3 could include battles with characters like Hela, Loki, Dormammu, and Ego, offering a range of exciting possibilities.

item.title: MCU Kingpin Actor Reveals The Only 2 Marvel Characters He Believes Could Kill The Villain
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVincent D’Onofrio believes Spider-Man and Daredevil have the best chance of defeating Kingpin in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. D’Onofrio will reprise his role as Kingpin in Disney+’s Echo. The actor shared his thoughts on the matter during an interview with Jake’s Takes. Literature ReviewKingpin actor Vincent D’Onofrio, who soon returns in Echo, has answered who are the Marvel Cinematic Universe characters that could kill Wilson Fisk. Kingpin actor Vincent D’Onofrio thinks that two Marvel Cinematic Universe could get the closest to taking Wilson Fisk out.

item.title: MCU Phase 5 Made One Guardian Look Incompetent 6 Years After Boosting His Powers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNebula’s mastery of the Yaka arrow in What If…? season 2 makes another member of the Guardians of the Galaxy look weak. Kraglin’s failure to use the Yaka arrow accurately in previous films is highlighted by Nebula’s effortless mastery in the show. What If…? unintentionally insults Kraglin, a new official member of the Guardians of the Galaxy, by making him seem incapable. Literature ReviewWhat If…? season 2 enhanced a Guardians of the Galaxy hero with a powerful new weapon, but this made another cosmic character seem weaker.

item.title: MCU Phase 5 Show Set Photos Reveal Filming Restart Despite Cancellation Rumors
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Wonder Man show has resumed filming after the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes. Set images for the MCU production suggest a movie premiere scene within the show. Rumors swirled of the show’s cancellation due to rising costs during strikes, but it looks like Marvel is keen to keep it going. Literature ReviewFollowing rumors of the show being cancelled outright due to the Hollywood strikes, the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Wonder Man is resuming filming.

item.title: MCU Theory Explains The Real Reason One Avenger Hasn t Suited Up Since Endgame
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRhodey, also known as War Machine, has not appeared in his supersuit since Avengers: Endgame, sparking speculation and theories. One theory suggests that Rhodey may be hesitant to wear the War Machine armor due to the lack of someone capable of fixing it after Tony Stark’s death. The introduction of Riri Williams/Ironheart in Black Panther: Wakanda Forever could potentially revitalize War Machine’s heroics and allow for the continuation of Tony Stark’s legacy alongside Rhodey.

item.title: MCUs Star-Lord Villain Story Shows Why His Guardians Of The Galaxy 3 Ending Needed To Take 9 Years
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPeter Quill’s villainous turn in What If…? shows the importance of his growth and understanding of his roots in the live-action MCU. Quill needed to stop idolizing the lives he could have had in order to make his return to Earth in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 meaningful. Chris Pratt’s return as Peter Quill in the MCU after Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 will allow for more exploration of him embracing his roots more genuinely.

item.title: Melissa Rauch Gushes Over Big Bang Theory Reunion In Night Court
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMelissa Rauch reunites with a former Big Bang Theory co-star in Night Court, expressing excitement about working together again. The co-star is Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, who appeared as a guest star in the final season of Big Bang Theory. Rauch is open to the possibility of bringing more Big Bang Theory cast members to Night Court in the future, but timing and fitting the narrative are important considerations. Literature ReviewFive years since it ended, Melissa Rauch reunites with a The Big Bang Theory co-star in her new network sitcom, NBC’s Night Court revival.

item.title: Meri Brown Slams Sister Wives Fans Who Attack Her Self-Esteem & Life Choices
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSister Wives star Meri Brown rejects the idea that fighting for her marriage is a sign of weakness, demonstrating her strength and resilience. Despite facing criticism and misconceptions about her self-worth, Meri knows her own value and remains confident in her choices. While Meri may have been blind to the cracks in her relationship with Kody, she ultimately made the difficult decision to separate and is finding strength in herself rather than seeking outside validation.

item.title: Meri Brown Unveils Stunning Hair Makeover Amid Dramatic Sister Wives Season 18 Tell-All
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSister Wives star Meri Brown undergoes a dramatic hair transformation, cutting her hair short, perming it, and changing its color to red and copper, which her fans find amazing. Since leaving Kody Brown, Meri has focused on building her business, friendships, and a great life for herself. She’s on a fitness journey and has a new positive attitude. Meri is living her best life, traveling, spending time with friends, and creating new, happier memories that don’t involve Kody.

item.title: Michael J. Foxs 13-Year-Old HBO Comedy Show Character Is His Most Hilarious Role In Decades
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMichael J. Fox’s role on Curb Your Enthusiasm was his most hilarious in decades, showcasing his comedic genius. The feud between Larry David and Michael J. Fox in Curb Your Enthusiasm highlighted Larry’s insensitivity and misplaced anger, with Fox becoming the hero by standing up for himself and others with Parkinson’s. Fox’s role on Curb Your Enthusiasm inspired him to return to TV acting, leading to his performances in shows like The Good Wife and Designated Survivor.

item.title: Michelle Yeoh s New Netflix Show Is Already Certified Fresh On Rotten Tomatoes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Brothers Sun starring Michelle Yeoh has been determined Certified Fresh on Rotten Tomatoes with an 80% score. The Netflix original series follows the story of a man protecting his family after his father’s assassination. The show combines action and comedy genres and has received largely positive reviews from 25 different critics. Literature ReviewMichelle Yeoh’s new action-comedy show on Netflix earns a Certified Fresh score on Rotten Tomatoes within a week of its streaming debut.

item.title: Michonne Examines A Rick Grimes Clue In Walking Dead Ones Who Live Promo
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new promo for The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live shows the mysterious cellphone carving Michonne discovered that could lead her to Rick Grimes. The carving implies that Rick or someone he knows found Michonne and Judith. The Japanese text on the carving suggests a new character from the CRM may be an ally in their reunion. Literature ReviewMichonne examines a mysterious clue to the whereabouts of Rick Grimes in a new promo for The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live spinoff series.

item.title: Midnight s Death In My Hero Academia Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMidnight’s death in My Hero Academia during the Paranormal Liberation War was handled disappointingly, as it occurred off-screen and received little attention. Her demise lacked the customary “blaze of glory” or farewell that other major characters in the series typically receive upon their deaths. Despite being a fan favorite with a unique journey, Midnight’s character was not given the chance to become more significant, making her death in the series feel unsatisfying.

item.title: Mike Flanagan s Upcoming Stephen King TV Show Was Subtly Teased In 7-Year-Old Horror Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMike Flanagan, known for his success in adapting Stephen King stories, holds the rights to bring The Dark Tower series to the screen. Flanagan’s 2017 movie Gerald’s Game subtly linked to The Dark Tower through a line of dialogue, creating a potential connection within his Dark Tower adaptation. Flanagan’s previous adaptations and attention to detail make him a trusted filmmaker to accurately capture King’s themes and interconnect his literary world on screen.

item.title: Million Dollar Listing NY Steve Gold s Age, Job, Instagram, & More
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSteve Gold’s good looks and charming personality drew in fans to Million Dollar Listing New York, but his real estate skills were also impressive. Before becoming a successful real estate agent, Steve had a career as a model, walking in numerous runway shows for high-fashion brands. Steve was born and raised in Stamford, Connecticut, but has made a name for himself as a top real estate agent in Manhattan.

item.title: Million Dollar Listing NY What We Know About Steve Gold s GF Luiza
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSteve Gold, a popular cast member on Million Dollar Listing New York, has a girlfriend named Luiza Gawlowska. Luiza is private and chooses to keep certain parts of her personal life off-screen and only shares glimpses on her Instagram. Luiza and Steve have a daughter named Rose and have decided to go public with their relationship to share the joy of their growing family. Literature ReviewSteve kept his life with his girlfriend private in Million Dollar Listing New York.

item.title: Milo Ventimiglia s Proposed Jess Fate Would Have Ruined Gilmore Girls
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMilo Ventimiglia wanted his Gilmore Girls character, Jess, to be killed off violently, a suggestion that the show’s creators wisely rejected. The gentle tone and warm dramedy of Gilmore Girls would have been permanently obliterated if Jess had been killed in a gruesome manner. Killing off Jess would have been tonally inconsistent with the show’s emphasis on personal betrayals and feuds rather than death and violence. Literature ReviewMilo Ventimiglia had an interesting fate in mind for Jess Mariano, but this plan would have ruined both his character and Gilmore Girls itself.

item.title: Mindhunter Season 3 Cancelation Gets A Candid Response From Bill Tench Actor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMindhunter season 3 was canceled despite acclaim. Holt McCallany “understands” and “accepts” the decision, but is open to returning. The show’s cancelation was likely due to low viewership and high production costs. Literature ReviewMindhunter season 3’s cancelation on Netflix receives a candid response from Bill Tench actor Holt McCallany, who remains open to returning. Summary Mindhunter season 3 was canceled despite acclaim. Holt McCallany “understands” and “accepts” the decision, but is open to returning.

item.title: Minx Season 3 Cancelation & Everything We Know
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMinx has officially been canceled by Starz, effectively ending the show forever. The season 2 finale left plenty of plot threads for Minx season 3 to explore, including the aftermath of Joyce’s rebellious act. The core cast, including Ophelia Lovibond and Jake Johnson, were expected to return for season 3 if it was renewed, along with other characters like Bambi and Constance. Literature ReviewAfter surviving cancelation on HBO after season 1, the raunchy comedy Minx has once again been canceled by its new home, Starz, after season 2.

item.title: Minx Season 3 Not Happening As Comedy Gets Cancelled For Second Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMinx season 3 was officially canceled, leaving fans disappointed. Starz ends ’70s-set comedy show despite a previous revival. Ophelia Lovibond and Jake Johnson’s Minx won’t return for season 3 Literature ReviewMinx season 3 isn’t happening, as the ’70s-set comedy show, which was picked up by Starz after being axed by Max, is canceled for the second time. Minx season 3 isn’t happening, as the period comedy show has been canceled for the second time.

item.title: Missy s New Young Sheldon Season 7 Role Explains Her Confusing Big Bang Theory Debut
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMissy’s expanded role in Young Sheldon season 7 allows her to showcase her kindness, wit, and ability to take on bigger responsibilities. Missy’s anger towards Sheldon in The Big Bang Theory was fueled by years of her parents catering to him, but she no longer harbors any animosity towards him. After limited appearances in The Big Bang Theory, it is revealed that Missy eventually found happiness, remarried, and had more children in her life.

item.title: Monarch Legacy Of Monsters Shocking Episode 9 Twist Explained By Showrunner
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 9 features the surprise return of Keiko, who is revealed to be alive in the Hollow Earth. Showrunner Chris Black reveals that they knew very early on that they wanted Keiko to survive the events of episode 1, it was just a matter of figuring out the exact mechanics of how. The show’s finale is poised to feature an emotional but complicated reunion between Shaw and Keiko due to their love triangle dynamic in the 1950s.

item.title: Monarch Legacy of Monsters Creator Reveals Surprising (& Bizarre) Influence For Monsterverse Show
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters draws inspiration from Desperate Housewives in using secrets as a compelling storytelling device. The series focuses on the human storylines and family drama of the Randa family, grounding it in relatable emotions despite the presence of massive monsters. The mystery behind the family’s connection to Monarch and the unveiling of shocking family secrets create intrigue and keep audiences hooked throughout the series. Literature ReviewExclusive: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters co-creator Chris Black explains the surprising influence his time on Desperate Housewives had on the series.

item.title: Monarch Legacy Of Monsters Episode 9 Recap & 4 Hollow Earth Reveals
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch launched a secret Hollow Earth mission in 1962, revealing their involvement in Operation Hourglass. Monarch lost government support due to the disastrous result of Operation Hourglass, leading to their weak state in Kong: Skull Island. Lee Shaw disappeared for 20 years in the Hollow Earth, explaining his age difference, and Keiko Randa has been alive in the Hollow Earth for 53 years. Literature ReviewThe twists and turns in Monarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 9 contributed some unexpected additions to the Monsterverse’s Hollow Earth lore.

item.title: Monarch Legacy Of Monsters Interview Chris Black On Episode 10 Reveals & What Comes Next
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters season 1 delivers a thrilling conclusion to its multi-timeline juggling act, with Dr. Keiko Miura alive, Lee Shaw accomplishing his mission, and a last-second reveal of King Kong promising more story. The show successfully navigates past, future, Titan, and human stories, thanks to its creators and writers who set it apart from the MonsterVerse films while still tying into them meaningfully. The season brings closure to the Randa family in a way that allows it to stand on its own, while setting up relationships and Titans for future exploration.

item.title: Monarch Legacy Of Monsters Interview Mari Yamamoto On Episode 10 & Keikos Future
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters season finale merges storylines, introduces King Kong, and sets up exciting possibilities for the future. Keiko’s escape from Axis Mundi to the modern timeline leads to emotional reunions and promises exciting opportunities for the Randa family. The finale’s reveals and emotional moments were carefully crafted, and there is potential for further exploration of relationships and Keiko’s role in the MonsterVerse. Literature ReviewScreen Rant interviews Monarch: Legacy of Monsters star Mari Yamamoto about shocking episode 10 reveals and her hopes for Keiko’s future.

item.title: Monarch Legacy Of Monsters Interview Ren Watabe On The Randa Family & Episode 9
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters fills in story gaps and introduces compelling new characters to the MonsterVerse. The first episode reveals that the supposedly dead father of the Randa family, Hiroshi, is alive and abandoned his families to save the world. In episode 9, Hiroshi and his son Kentaro are reunited in an emotional moment, while believing that another family member, Cate, has died. Literature ReviewScreen Rant interviews Ren Watabe, who plays Kentaro, about the Randa family and the twists and turns of Monarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 9.

item.title: Monarch Legacy Of Monsters Season 2 Update Given By Showrunner
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters showrunner Chris Black remains optimistic about the possibility of a season 2. The show has been successful so far, raising hopes for its renewal. Black believes there is still more story to tell, adding to the ongoing Monsterverse. Literature ReviewMonarch: Legacy of Monsters season 2 is given an update by showrunner Chris Black, who addresses if the Monsterverse series will be renewed. Warning: SPOILERS ahead for Monarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 9!

item.title: Monarch Legacy Of Monsters Stars Didn t Know Season 1 s Ending When They Started Filming
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe cast of Monarch: Legacy of Monsters didn’t know where the show was going when they first started filming, but the collaborative production environment allowed them to bring the characters to life through their own interpretations. The odd timeline and surprising twists in the first season left both the actors and viewers confused at times. The future of Monarch: Legacy of Monsters is uncertain, but its connection to the MonsterVerse could influence a decision for a second season.

item.title: Monarch s Huge APEX Twist Explains 2 Godzilla Vs. Kong Mysteries
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 10 reveals that APEX had a base on Skull Island, explaining their extensive knowledge of the Hollow Earth. The season finale also shows that both APEX and Monarch have outposts on Skull Island, debunking the assumption that only Monarch had a base there. The show leaves open the mystery of how Walter Simmons acquired Ghidorah’s head, potentially hinting at a relationship between APEX and Jonah that can be explored in season 2.

item.title: Monarch Season 1 Ending & Surprise Cameo Explained By Creators
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters season 1 ends on Skull Island after a two-year time jump, with Kong shown near an Apex facility. Creators Matt Fraction and Chris Black tease that Kong or another monster could be the focus of a potential season 2. The show’s ending sets up a new story involving Apex and could provide more context for movies like Godzilla vs. Kong and Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire.

item.title: Monarch Season 1 Ending Explained THAT Titan Cameo Sets Up A Very Different Season 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKeiko Randa is still alive in the Monsterverse, having survived the Hollow Earth and not experiencing any aging. The underground world explored in the finale is called Axis Mundi, serving as a bridge between the surface and the Hollow Earth. Godzilla defeated the Ion Dragon in a battle, but its fate is unclear, and Lee Shaw’s death was also not confirmed, leaving room for both to have survived. Literature ReviewMonarch: Legacy of Monsters’ season 1 finale was packed with twists, including a surprise Titan cameo that set up a completely different season 2.

item.title: Monarch Season 1 s Ending Twist Sets Up The Monsterverse s Missing Mecha-Titan
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe season finale of Monarch: Legacy of Monsters hints at the introduction of a mecha-Titan, potentially on Skull Island. The show deviates from the heroic portrayal of Monarch in the Monsterverse movies, as APEX rescues the main characters. Monarch: Legacy of Monsters may explain why Monarch desires a mechanized giant and how it ties into Mechagodzilla in the Monsterverse. Literature ReviewThe big twist in the Monarch: Legacy of Monsters season 1 finale finally gives the Monsterverse an opportunity to introduce its missing mecha-Titan.

item.title: Monarch Show Corrects The Biggest Problem With KOTM s Villain Plan
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters corrects the villains’ plan from Godzilla: King of the Monsters by showing that their idea was pointless. The show’s dual timelines provide depth to the Monsterverse lore, exploring the origins of Monarch and introducing theories and historical context. Colonel Lee Shaw’s plan to stop Titans from emerging makes more sense than the eco-terrorists’ plan to unleash them, considering the potential death and destruction caused by the Titans and the unknown impact on the globe.

item.title: Monarch Show Hints At 2 New Monsterverse Titans & Why They Haven t Appeared Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 8 introduces two new Titans to the Monsterverse, with more potentially to come. The show hints at possible monster locations in Siberia and Yucatan, Mexico, though there is uncertainty surrounding the validity of these sightings. The exchange between Bill and Keiko explains why the two potential Titans have not been discovered before, leaving room for future exploration. Literature ReviewMonarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 8 set the stage for two new Monsterverse Titans, while also hinting at why they haven’t appeared yet.

item.title: Monarch Show Reveals A New Monsterverse Time Period & What It Means For Season 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonarch: Legacy of Monsters season 2 will explore a new period in the Monsterverse timeline, moving the story to 2017 after a time jump in the season 1 finale. Keiko and Hiroshi Randa are now part of the show’s principal characters, and they have found an unlikely ally in APEX. The show may address Monarch’s growing public scrutiny and the risk of more Titans rising to the surface due to Hollow Earth rifts in season 2.

item.title: Monarch Show s New Monster Makes Us Even More Excited For Godzilla X Kong
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new creature called the Bramble Boar appeared in Monarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 9, teasing what to expect from Godzilla x Kong. The series overcomes challenges regarding its placement in the Monsterverse timeline and offers a promising glimpse into the next Monsterverse movie, especially with its exploration of the Hollow Earth. Monarch: Legacy of Monsters introduces a darker tone and showcases the potential for horror in Godzilla x Kong, while still embracing the campier side of the franchise.

item.title: Money Heist Character Guide Every Robber s Real Name & Backstory
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMoney Heist (La Casa de Papel) is a popular Netflix series about a group of robbers with fake names. The Professor is the mastermind behind the heists and has a tragic backstory that motivates his actions. The show features a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique backstories and roles in the heists. Literature ReviewNetflix crime series Money Heist follows a group of robbers who pull off daring heists.

item.title: Monsieur Spade Interview Clive Owen On Channelling Humphrey Bogart For Neo-Noir Show
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMonsieur Spade is a neo-noir show set in the ’60s, following the retired private detective Sam Spade as he investigates a series of murders in a small French town. The show features an ensemble cast led by Golden Globe winner Clive Owen, who brings a magnetic performance to the iconic character of Sam Spade. Clive Owen drew inspiration from Humphrey Bogart’s portrayal of Sam Spade in The Maltese Falcon, aiming to capture the fast-paced dialogue and stoic demeanor of the character.

item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEmily Rudd is committed to playing the character Nami in Netflix’s One Piece as long as they let her, stating “I am her and she is me.” Rudd is most excited about filming scenes from the Enies Lobby arc, which fundamentally changes the Straw Hat Crew and puts them in direct conflict with the World Government. The Enies Lobby arc marks a turning point for the crew, as they gain new abilities, face more enemies and threats, and leave behind their beloved ship.

item.title: Netflix s One Piece Will Need To Change 1 Big Element Of Nico Robin s Character For Live-Action
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRobin’s older age compared to the rest of the crew is a challenge for the live-action adaptation, as it affects the dynamics and chemistry between the characters. The maternal role Robin takes on in the original material may not work as well in live-action, where the characters seem older than their anime counterparts. The context and skills that Robin developed over the years justify her older age compared to the other Straw Hats and are necessary for her character to be portrayed accurately in the show.

item.title: Netflix s Upcoming Harlan Coben Show Shares 1 Major Problem With Its Hit 2-Year-Old Legal Drama
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNetflix’s upcoming Harlan Coben show faces a major problem as rights issues prevent the inclusion of key characters from the novels. This situation is not unique, as a similar problem occurred with Netflix’s adaptation of “The Lincoln Lawyer.” While disappointing for viewers, this rights issue may actually result in higher quality content as platforms focus on adapting specific parts of the authors’ work. Literature ReviewThe major problem that Netflix’s highly anticipated upcoming Harlan Coben show faces is one that its hit 2-year-old legal drama has faced as well.

item.title: Netflix Skipping Ahead To One Piece s Latest Arc Makes Sense & Here Is Why
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe latest One Piece arc, the Egghead arc, is a good starting point for new viewers, according to the series author. Despite its length, starting from the beginning of One Piece is highly recommended and worth the time. Netflix is releasing new episodes of One Piece despite not having the rest of the series available to stream. Literature ReviewViewers watching the One Piece anime on Netflix are missing a large chunk of the story, but even the series’ author says it’s okay to skip ahead.

item.title: Netflixs Fool Me Once Replacement Is Already In The Works (& Is Way More Exciting Than Another Season)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFool Me Once, based on the novel by Harlan Coben, is unlikely to have a second season due to its miniseries format and singular source material. However, Netflix is developing a new show based on Harlan Coben’s Myron Bolitar series, which promises thrilling moments and potential for multiple seasons. The Myron Bolitar series, with its 11 books, offers ample material for Netflix to explore and break the trend of single-season adaptations of Coben’s works.

item.title: Netflixs One Piece Failed 2 Straw Hats (& It Wont Be Easy To Fix Them)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOne Piece season 2 needs to give Usopp and Sanji more to do after season 1 failed their characters. The show could take liberties with the source material to give Usopp and Sanji more development and potential. Netflix can strengthen Usopp and Sanji’s characterizations compared to season 1 through well-timed flashbacks and exploring their internal struggles. Literature ReviewOne Piece was a huge success, but two of the Straw Hat Pirates weren’t as developed as the rest.

item.title: Netflixs One Piece Fixed The Most Common Complaint About The Anime 24 Years Later
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNetflix’s One Piece is praised as one of the best live-action adaptations ever made, successfully addressing the common complaint of the anime’s slow pacing when it comes to new audiences. One Piece season 1 compressed the East Blue saga into eight hour-long episodes, allowing new audiences to jump into the series more quickly compared to the anime. The live-action series made significant changes to the source material, but still achieved a satisfying and condensed version of the story, comparable to the Episode of East Blue film.

item.title: Netflixs Star Trek Prodigy Season 2 Release Plan Is A Mystery To Showrunners
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYStar Trek: Prodigy season 2 will premiere on Netflix in 2024, but the exact release date is unknown. The first season of Star Trek: Prodigy was a success on Netflix, which bodes well for the second season. The creators and fans are eagerly anticipating the release of season 2, but the release strategy and episode format are uncertain due to Netflix’s changing strategies. Literature ReviewStar Trek: Prodigy season 2 will premiere on Netflix in 2024, but when and how will the episodes drop?

item.title: New Big Bang Theory Spinoff Will Break A Record That Young Sheldon Continued For 5 Years
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYYoung Sheldon will end after season 7, but a new Big Bang Theory spinoff is in development, likely breaking a record. Jim Parsons decided to leave The Big Bang Theory, but continued playing Sheldon in Young Sheldon through voice-overs. Parsons may not be involved in the upcoming spinoff, but there is interest in seeing him make a cameo as Sheldon again. Literature ReviewChuck Lorre’s next The Big Bang Theory spinoff is expected to break a record that Young Sheldon continued when the nerd-centric sitcom ended in 2019.

item.title: New Crunchyroll Anime Puts a Fresh Spin on Reincarnation & Proves it Doesn t Need Isekai
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Unwanted Undead Adventurer proves that anime with reincarnated protagonists can be captivating without being an isekai. The protagonist’s transformation into a skeleton in his own world adds depth to the story and allows for character growth. The introduction of a new character creates a touching friendship and increases anticipation for future episodes. Literature ReviewThe Unwanted Undead Adventurer is showing how reincarnation, while a major component of isekai, is sometimes all that’s needed to tell a story.

item.title: New Details On Canceled Lizzie McGuire Reboot Revealed (Including Racy Hook-Up Between Beloved Characters)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe canceled Lizzie McGuire revival would have shown adult Lizzie living in New York. Disney halted production in 2020, finding the show too mature for its platform. Writer Jonathan Hurwitz reveals on TikTok that in the revival, Lizzie meets up with Gordo, who is engaged and expecting a baby with another woman. In episode 3, Lizzie wakes up in Ethan’s bed, implying a hook-up between the two. It’s likely the Gordo and Ethan storylines would have divided fans of the original series, especially those rooting for Lizzie and Gordo to end up together.

item.title: New Doctor Who Spinoff Reportedly In Development
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA production listing reveals the possibility of a new spin-off titled The War Between The Land and Sea, focusing on the 70s foes, the Sea Devils. Doctor Who season 14, with Ncuti Gatwa as the Fifteenth Doctor, is set to premiere in May 2024. Russell T Davis previously shared his plans to expand the Doctor Who universe, which could even rival ones like the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Literature ReviewA new production listing hints at Doctor Who’s first major spin-off in Russell T Davies’ second tenure as showrunner, and it teases familiar foes.

item.title: New Doctor Who Spinoff Reports Aren t Anything Like We Expected (But That s A Good Thing)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Who is entering a bold new era with Russell T Davies at the helm, leading to the expansion of the Whoniverse through spinoffs. A Sea Devils spinoff is a surprising choice, as they are considered B-list villains with limited appearances and little impact in the main show. Despite initial skepticism, a Sea Devils spinoff offers creative freedom and the potential for an intriguing story that can integrate other classic Doctor Who villains and involve UNIT.

item.title: New Hulu Murder Mystery Show Is Subtly A Remake Of $130 Million Hercule Poirot Box Office Bomb
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Death and Other Details” is a murder mystery show on Hulu that shares similarities with the poorly performing Hercule Poirot movie “Death on the Nile”. Both stories take place on luxury cruises and involve wealthy passengers who could be the murderer, but the new show introduces a unique detective character, Rufus Cotesworth. While Hercule Poirot is a well-established and trusted detective, viewers have yet to fully trust Cotesworth due to his past failures and imperfect record.

item.title: New Isekai Anime is Already the Season s Must-Watch Romance
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTales of Wedding Rings sets itself apart from other isekai series by prioritizing romance over action and adventure. The debut episode introduces common romance tropes, but also surprises viewers with two unexpected kisses. The incorporation of the isekai genre adds complexity to the star-crossed lovers’ storyline, hinting at future complications. Literature ReviewTales of Wedding Rings might be an isekai – but romance is one of the key drivers of this new series with formulated and even innovated tropes.

item.title: New Isekai Anime Perfects the Mistakenly Summoned Trope With Great Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic puts a fresh spin on the isekai trope, making it more exciting and action-packed. The protagonist’s healing magic attracts a violent and rough healer, adding a unique element to the series. The anime effectively differentiates the protagonist’s situation and introduces unconventional training methods that captivate viewers. Literature ReviewThe Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic follows in the footsteps of The Saint’s Magic Power is Omnipotent, but it fixes key tropes to be more exciting.

item.title: New Netflix Survival Movie About 52-Year-Old Disaster Is A Necessary Watch Before Yellowjackets Season 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYYellowjackets season 3’s tragedies are expected to worsen with increasingly shocking survival tactics for the teens. Society of the Snow, a new Netflix movie, provides a compelling account of the real 1972 Andes plane crash and adds important context to the struggles in Yellowjackets. Yellowjackets was loosely inspired by the real Andes flight disaster, including the survivors’ agonizing decision to resort to cannibalism, although there are differences in how it is depicted.

item.title: New On Peacock All 91 Movies & TV Shows Arriving In January
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPeacock offers a robust catalog of movies and TV shows and continues to expand its reach with new content added every month. Peacock has become a multifaceted platform by including live-streaming sports and securing lucrative deals with major sports organizations. In January 2024, Peacock is adding over 90 new movies and TV shows to its collection, including popular titles like The Proposal and the Twilight Saga. Literature ReviewNBC Universal’s streaming service Peacock offers a wide variety of movies, TV shows, and even live events, with much more arriving every month.

item.title: New Photos Confirm 90 Day Fiancé s Angela & Michael Are Together In America
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAngela and Michael from 90 Day Fiancé have been seen together in the US, indicating they are still a couple in 2024. Angela had trust issues due to Michael cheating on her, but she decided to give him another chance. Angela and Michael were spotted at an airport in LA, and Angela waved at fans, showing her love for them. Literature Review90 Day Fiancé star Michael Ilesanmi is indeed in America in 2024 according to his latest photos.

item.title: New Sherlock Holmes Show Will Be The Fifth Adaptation Of This Conan Doyle Story In 13 Years
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWatson will be a modern adaptation of Sherlock Holmes, focusing on John Watson after Sherlock’s death. The show is borrowing from “The Final Problem,” exploring Sherlock’s death at the hands of Moriarty. Recent adaptations have also explored this concept, making Sherlock’s death and Moriarty’s character well-established in pop culture. Literature ReviewCBS’s upcoming Watson TV show will join a long list of Sherlock Holmes adaptations to have borrowed from one of the detective’s most famous stories.

item.title: New Star Wars Trailer Teases A Key Moment In Jedi History
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLucasfilm released a new trailer for Young Jedi Adventures, teasing a major Jedi ceremony and the opening of Starlight Beacon, a key event in the High Republic Era. The upcoming episodes of Young Jedi Adventures will explore the time period profoundly affected by the Nihil and the Drengir, leading up to the devastating destruction of Starlight Beacon. While the show is aimed at younger viewers, these episodes are essential viewing for all Star Wars fans, especially with Master Yoda being otherwise engaged.

item.title: New Walking Dead Villain Update Teases Rick Grimes Most Dangerous Enemy In 14 Years
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe upcoming villain in The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live is set to be the most complex rival Rick Grimes has faced in the TV franchise. Major General Beale, played by Terry O’Quinn, will be a challenging opponent for Rick, with a non-threatening, level-headed demeanor and a larger focus on development. Rick will need to employ new tactics and be strategic in learning about Beale, who has about 2,000 troops under him and a calm and calculated approach to leading a massive community.

item.title: Next Marvel TV Show All 11 Upcoming MCU Releases Confirmed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe MCU is expanding its universe with several new TV shows on Disney+, allowing supporting and secondary characters to shine, and introducing smaller-scale heroes. Popular MCU shows like WandaVision, Ms. Marvel, Moon Knight, Hawkeye, and Loki have paved the way for more exciting Disney+ series in development. Upcoming series include X-Men ‘97, Agatha: Darkhold Diaries, Ironheart, Daredevil: Born Again, Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, and more. Literature ReviewMarvel Studios’ most recent Disney+ series may have come to an end, but there are plenty of upcoming MCU TV shows in development.
